product_name: Therm-a-Rest ProLite Sleeping Pad - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for alpine climbing, adventure racing and long-distance backpacking, this women-specific pad features extra insulation in the torso and foot areas to help keep you warm and comfortable.
short_description: Ideal for alpine climbing, adventure racing and long-distance backpacking, this women-specific pad features extra insulation in the torso and foot areas to help keep you warm and comfortable.
